lead_paragraph: Tommy Robredo and Elena Dementieva won their opening matches at the Pilot Pen, an ATP hardcourt tournament in New Haven. Robredo, the No. 2 seed in the men’s draw, reached the third round with a 6-4, 6-4 victory against Marc Gicquel of France. Dementieva, seeded sixth among the women, beat Mara Santangelo of Italy, 6-2, 3-6, 6-0.
